txt.en: 'Good [placeholder], you seem a well-travelled one, I dare say! You have just moved into the Households of the Kingstead, have you not? If you are looking for a home with a slow pace to life, you have come to the right place. Still, we pride ourselves on keeping the neighbourhood both clean and friendly. I hope that you will join us in building a brighter community, my friend!'
'Good, good! I have many things that need doing. If we all pitch in, they will be done in no time at all!'
The majestic plains of Rohan are in need of farmers and horse-friends. Burginda has suggested you might take the opportunity to purchase your own home in Rohan.
Burginda can be found at Edoras or the Kingstead neighbourhoods.\n\nYou should talk to Burginda.
